It works really well for me. All you have to do is click the little button and you have multiple A.I chat bots waiting for you. You can talk to them all at the same time or you can just talk to one. You can chose which ones you would like to display and which ones you want to hide. It doesn't save you previous conversations though. It can only access your recent data if you activate it. It can not activate you search history, passwords or log into any personal apps like spo... Show more

While the extension seems to work as advertised, I have concerns about its transparency, especially considering it handles sensitive data like your private API keys for paid services.

The developer claims the extension is open-source, but the code on GitHub (version 1.45.7) significantly lags behind the latest version available in the store (v2.9.4). This raises red flags and makes it difficult to trust the extension's security practices.
With LLMs evolving everyday, ChatHub is a game changer for identifying these and which LLMs I should use for my specific use cases!! Use it in my workflow daily!

ChatHub is a fantastic Chrome extension that makes it easy to access a range of AI chatbots. It brings all your favorite chatbots into one place, so you can switch between them without a hassle. Its simple interface makes it easy to use, and the chatbots respond quickly. Some extra features may cost a bit, but it’s worth checking out for anyone using Chrome who’s interested in AI assistants. Wish it would work also on mobile in the kiwi browser as well. Any thoughts on that?
Amazing has all the chat bots in one place easy access. The price is also amazing have not found one cheaper with the qualitythis brings.

its an amazing tool

THanks to this extension, I can query all AI at once, It has other great features too, like the option to allow ChatGPT with internet access and save the history which Bing and Bard does not unless export manually

ChatHub is a remarkable Chrome extension that offers convenient access to a variety of AI-powered chatbots. It brings together popular chatbots into a single interface, allowing for seamless switching between them. The user-friendly interface ensures easy navigation, and the integrated chatbots are highly responsive. While certain advanced features may have associated costs, ChatHub is still a must-try for Chrome users interested in exploring AI assistants.

ChatHub has been a game changer for my productivity and efficiency. This single extension provides access to four of the leading AI chatbots—Bing, Bard, ChatGPT, and Claude—all in one simple grid interface. No more switching between tabs and interfaces to leverage different chatbots.

I have a ChatGPT Plus subscription, and ChatHub conveniently connects with my account to provide the full capabilities. The chatbots themselves need no introduction, offering intelligent responses, information l... Show more
